DOC.brief_summary: Rationale conduct experiment : Israel perform IVF treatment since 1980 . Although ART ( Advanced Reproductive Treatments ) evolve year implantation pregnancy rate meet expectation yet . Success rate fertility treatment 15-18 % ( clinical pregnancy rate =CPR ) . As result additional method ( clinical , technological complimentary ) try improve CPR . In reviews effect acupuncture practice fertility treatment show certain benefit , include pain relief relaxation . Unfortunately trial randomize lacked methodological rigor . The aim study evaluate effect acupuncture pain , anxiety , CPR woman undergo IVF compare standard care alone .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Symptom Control During Assisted Reproductive Treatments Procedures

Following consent , woman randomize acupuncture addition standard care OR standard care accord work day acupuncture practitioner ( work alternately three day week ) . After IVF stimulation protocol patient acupuncture group three acupuncture treatment : The first take place right oocytes retrieval second treatment right embryo transfer , lastly 20-30 minute embryo transfer . Patients control group receive standard care . Patients group fill questionnaire regard expectation complementary medicine ( likert scale expectation -- high expectation ) , anxiety level ( Visual Analogue Scale= VAS ) procedure , well pain assessment ( VAS ) IVF procedure . In addition , general satisfaction questionnaire overall care IVF unit complete last visit ( likert scale unsatisfied -- highly satisfied ) . Finally , physician report procedure ease complexity likert scale ( easy-very difficult ) .
